mapper.insert: insert into user_info (user_id, user_pw, user_name, user_email, gender, birth_date, address, phone, prof_photo, ext_exp, bank, bank_ac_num, college, college_dept, par_phone, user_grade) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{gender}, #{birth_date}, #{address}, #{phone}, #{prof_photo}, #{ext_exp}, #{bank}, #{bank_ac_num}, #{college}, #{college_dept}, #{par_phone}, #{user_grade})
mapper.select: select user_grade, user_name from user_info where user_id = #{user_id}
mapper.insert: insert into ext_timetable (user_id, ext_id, day_week, class_str_time, class_end_time) values(#{user_id}, #{ext_id}, #{day_week}, #{class_str_time}, #{class_end_time})

insert into ext_info (ext_id, end_rc_date, str_class_date, end_class_date, class_poss_area, ext_obj, class_lev, intro_class, ext_way, tuit_fees, user_id) values(#{ext_id}, date_add(sysdate(), interval +7 day), date_add(sysdate(), interval +8 day), date_add(sysdate(), interval +38 day), #{class_poss_area}, #{ext_obj}, #{class_lev}, #{intro_class}, #{ext_way}, #{tuit_fees}, #{user_id})
mapper.select: select a.prof_photo from user_info a, ext_info b where b.ext_id=#{ext_id} and a.user_grade='teacher'
mapper.insert: insert into user_searchlog(user_id, onoff, pg, subject, location1, location2, college, str_tuit_fees, end_tuit_fees, ext_obj, carrer_yn, ext_exp, gender, ext_way, class_lev) values(#{user_id}, #{onoff}, #{pg}, #{subject}, #{location1}, #{location2}, #{college}, #{str_tuit_fees}, #{end_tuit_fees}, #{ext_obj}, #{carrer_yn}, #{ext_exp}, #{gender}, #{ext_way}, #{class_lev})
